data.title: If you wear prescription glasses this deal is for you!
data.text:
Eyemart Express, is opening their a new store in St. George! They offer affordable and same-day prescription glasses. This is their sixth location in Utah.

Eyemart Express has been focused on improving lives by helping people see better for the last 30 years.

They offer the fastest production of glasses in the industry. 90% of glasses purchased from our stores are delivered on the same day. Some glasses can even be ready in as little as 30 minutes.

To celebrate the opening of the new store, shoppers can save on top of our existing affordable prices. Starting on November 9, you can get two pairs of single vision glasses for $19 or two pairs of glasses with progressive lenses for only $68. Those of you who wear glasses know that this is a really great deal!

Eyemart Express offers more than 2,000 quality and affordable frame options with a variety of brands including Michael Kors, Coach, Ray-Ban, Nike, and Disney.

They are proud to offer a one-year frame warranty on all our glasses that covers any adjustments or breakages.

They accept more than 1,000 insurance plans, so we can help you maximize your insurance benefits. However, with affordable prices like ours, you donâ€™t need insurance to shop with us.

To keep shoppers safe during this time they have added steps, including wearing masks, limiting the number of people in their stores, and frequent cleaning, so that our customers can have peace of mind while shopping for new glasses.

They offer an additional 20 percent everyday discount to all veterans, military members and their families, health care professionals, first responders, and school faculty and staff members with valid IDs.
